readable.title: 2665461736_595c87f0a3
readable.content: A man in a yellow coat tends a fire , a boy in a parka watches . a person cooking on a fire while a small child watches . A person holds a frying pan over an open fire as a child watches . The adult cooks over the fire as the child looks on . The man in the yellow jacket is cooking over an open fire as the little boy watches .
